title: How to Look Like You're a Professional Computer Hacker

steps.title: Have a hacker-like computer style.
steps.content: Have a hacker-like computer style. Find a picture of skull and crossbones. Use paint or a program like that to put writing under the skull saying something like this: XXXYOURNAMEHEREXXX. Where it says YOURNAMEHERE, just put your name in all caps. Set that as your desktop background.

steps.title: Open command prompt.
steps.content: Open command prompt. Go to start, run, and type cmd.exe.

steps.title: Move it leftmost and make it go up and down fully across the screen.
steps.content: Move it leftmost and make it go up and down fully across the screen.

steps.title: Type start and press enter.
steps.content: Type start and press enter. Another command prompt should come up. Line it up with the other one, and make that one go up and down fully across the screen. Keep doing this until your screen is filled up with command prompts.

steps.title: Type start one more time, but just minimize that command prompt.
steps.content: Type start one more time, but just minimize that command prompt.

steps.title: In each window type:
steps.content: In each window type: color a

steps.title: Going from left to right, type in the first one:
steps.content: Going from left to right, type in the first one: title hack01. Then in the next one type title hack02 and so on.

steps.title: In each command prompt type the following:
steps.content: In each command prompt type the following: @echo off cls tree

steps.title: Now open the other command prompt window that we minimized.
steps.content: Now open the other command prompt window that we minimized.

steps.title: Type ping, then a random website, and -t.
steps.content: Type ping, then a random website, and -t. For example, ping www.google.com -t
